title: Jimmy Bartel’s Instagram Move All But Confirms New Romance
text:
When Nadia and Jimmy Bartel split earlier this year, unconfirmed rumours of cheating and infidelity stuck to headlines like glue. Reports of Jimmy flying to the UK after the split to meet with Lauren Mand, a Melbourne socialite who’s been based there, dominated the news cycle.

While neither couple confirmed the news, Nadia alluded to it in an interview with the Herald Sun, saying that it had been a “difficult time” for her and her sons Aston, three, and Henley, 11 months.

Brownlow 2019 red carpet highlights The best dressed of the 2019 Brownlow red carpet

“Although I’m heartbroken, I don’t want to comment specifically on what’s been reported about Jim’s trip to the UK as I don’t think that is in anyone’s interests,” she told the publication.

“My single focus now is to continue to protect, care and provide for my two beautiful boys as this is a personal matter. I am so thankful for my very supportive family and friends.”

Now, an Instagram move by Jimmy has all but confirmed - or at the very least, is doing nothing to quell the rumours - he’s moved on. The 35-year-old ex-AFL player has followed Lauren Mand on Instagram.

Why Nadia Bartel’s Brownlow appearance was a lesson in reclaiming power post-breakup. Plus, a WAG shares what really happens at the Brownlow .

The Herald Sun also reports that Jimmy and Lauren were seen together at a Sydney restaurant on August 28.

Speaking with Channel 7 recently about her new show, The All New Monty: Ladies' Night, 34-year-old Nadia spoke of how painful the break up has been.

“It's been a tough time personally for me recently. It's just so painful,” she said.

“I'm hoping with Ladies' Night it will give me more confidence. Obviously we're there for the cause [raising awareness for breast cancer], but I think it will be great for me to put myself out there.”

Jimmy hasn’t commented on the rumours he’s with Mand, only saying to radio station 3AW previously that the situation was “not great… I am probably not going to provide any commentary on it.”

“I know I am in the public eye and people are interested, but it is a private matter and I ask for a bit of respect because obviously Nadia and the boys [are] involved,” he said.
description: After splitting with Nadia Bartel, the ex-AFL player seems to be moving on.
